timeline.message: Feat(Swagger): Add swagger auto-generated documentation for 'web' package
Feat(About): Add documentation link to the about page

timeline.bodyText: Won't this redirect the user in the browser to this URL? So shouldn't we get the public URL of Alert? or is the idea here to limit it to only users with access to the container?
timeline.author: jamesrichard91

replies.bodyText: The "localhost" portion is just because the URL is optional. If there is another variable available, I can use that, but I don't know of one.
replies.author: gkillough

replies.bodyText: alert properties will have the public URL if the ALERT_SERVER_HOST environment variable is set. It's the same variable we use to put in the emails for the alert server url
replies.author: psantos1113
